item.title: [dmr] Fact or Fiction
item.description:
Instant

Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

item.title: [dmr] Fact or Fiction
item.description:
Instant

Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

item.title: [dmr] Faceless Butcher
item.description:
Creature — Nightmare Horror

When Faceless Butcher enters the battlefield, exile target creature other than Faceless Butcher.

When Faceless Butcher leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

item.title: [dmr] Fa'adiyah Seer
item.description:
Creature — Human Shaman

{T}: Draw a card and reveal it. If it isn't a land card, discard it.

item.title: [dmr] Exploration
item.description:
Enchantment

You may play an additional land on each of your turns.

item.title: [dmr] Evil Eye of Orms-by-Gore
item.description:
Creature — Eye

Non-Eye creatures you control can't attack.

Evil Eye of Orms-by-Gore can't be blocked except by Walls.

item.description:

Search your library for a card, put that card into your graveyard, then shuffle.

item.title: [dmr] Empty the Warrens
item.description:
Sorcery

Create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens.

Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn.)

item.title: [dmr] Emerald Charm
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Untap target permanent.

• Destroy target non-Aura enchantment.

• Target creature loses flying until end of turn.

item.title: [dmr] Ember Beast
item.description:
Creature — Beast

Ember Beast can't attack or block alone.

item.title: [dmr] Elvish Spirit Guide
item.description:
Creature — Elf Spirit

Exile Elvish Spirit Guide from your hand: Add {G}.

item.title: [dmr] Elvish Aberration
item.description:
Creature — Elf Mutant

{T}: Add {G}{G}{G}.

Forestcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)

item.title: [dmr] Duress
item.description:
Sorcery

Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

item.title: [dmr] Dromar's Cavern
item.description:
Land — Lair

When Dromar's Cavern enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return a non-Lair land you control to its owner's hand.

{T}: Add {W}, {U}, or {B}.

item.title: [dmr] Drifting Meadow
item.description:
Land

Drifting Meadow enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {W}.

Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

item.title: [dmr] Dread Return
item.description:
Sorcery

Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

Flashback—Sacrifice three creatures. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [dmr] Dread Return
item.description:

Flashback—Sacrifice three creatures. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [dmr] Dralnu's Crusade
item.description:
Enchantment

Goblin creatures get +1/+1.

All Goblins are black and are Zombies in addition to their other creature types.

item.title: [dmr] Dragon Whelp
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

{R}: Dragon Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn. If this ability has been activated four or more times this turn, sacrifice Dragon Whelp at the beginning of the next end step.

item.title: [dmr] Dragon Blood
item.description:
Artifact

{3}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

item.title: [dmr] Dodecapod
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Golem

If a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Dodecapod, put it onto the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it instead of putting it into your graveyard.

item.title: [dmr] Divine Sacrament
item.description:
Enchantment

White creatures get +1/+1.

Threshold — White creatures get an additional +1/+1 as long as seven or more cards are in your graveyard.

item.description:

When Denizen of the Deep enters the battlefield, return each other creature you control to its owner's hand.

item.description:
Sorcery

Target player draws two cards.

Flashback—{1}{U}, Pay 3 life. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [dmr] Deadwood Treefolk
item.description:
Creature — Treefolk

Vanishing 3 (This creature enters the battlefield with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter from it. When the last is removed, sacrifice it.)

When Deadwood Treefolk enters or leaves the battlefield, return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

item.title: [dmr] Deadapult
item.description:
Enchantment

{R}, Sacrifice a Zombie: Deadapult deals 2 damage to any target.

item.title: [dmr] Dark Withering
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target nonblack creature.

Madness {B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

Madness {B} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

item.title: [dmr] Dark Depths
item.description:
Legendary Snow Land

Dark Depths enters the battlefield with ten ice counters on it.

{3}: Remove an ice counter from Dark Depths.

When Dark Depths has no ice counters on it, sacrifice it. If you do, create Marit Lage, a legendary 20/20 black Avatar creature token with flying and indestructible.
